name: Show_hardware_design
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(SIM PC Desk Configuration,Hardware Design Selection - Sim PC Node1,Node Supplier (Sim PC),Display Size (Sim PC),Additional Hard Disk (Sim PC Desk),Optional DVD (Sim PC Desk),Display Supplier (Sim PC),Ent_sim_desk_tpm,Trackball (Sim PC),Sim PC Cluster)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory (Sim PC Desk))*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Sim PC Desk))*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory (Sim PC Desk))*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory (Sim PC Desk))*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Sim PC Cluster:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
